ingredients.content: 2 - 4 fresh kaffir lime leaves (see tip), stalks removed
2 spring onions (approx. 40 g), cut in pieces
600 g white fish fillets (e.g. cod, haddock), cut in pieces (3-4 cm)
30 - 50 g Thai red curry paste, to taste
1 long red chilli, thinly sliced, to garnish

preparations.content: Lightly grease Varoma dish and tray and set aside. Place kaffir lime leaves in mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add green beans and spring onions and chop <b>6-8 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add white fish fillets, Thai red curry paste, coconut cream, egg white and salt and chop <b>Turbo/1 sec/3 times<b>, or until mix is well combined but not puréed.

Roll mixture into 18 equal-sized balls (approx. 1 heaped Tbsp each) and gently flatten each ball to form fish cakes. Place several fish cakes in prepared Varoma dish and tray, being careful not to let fish cakes touch.
Place water in mixing bowl and place Varoma into position. Steam <b>16 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>. Transfer to a plate and keep warm.
Place remaining fish cakes in Varoma dish and tray, place Varoma into position and steam <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>. Serve fish cakes warm, garnished with chilli.
